attributes.action: subject himself to a full body scan at an airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since we the people are expected to accept without complaint full body scanning at airports the PM should set an example and allay fears and allow himself to be scanned by one of these machine and show the world it is a big fuss about a very little thing.

rejection.details: This petition has no point about government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
